trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_SEQ_00<tab>Mahiwa appears troubled.
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Mahiwa's eldest son.
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_TODO_01<tab>/huh at Mahiwa's eldest son.
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Mahiwa's younger son.
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_TODO_03<tab>/huh at Mahiwa's younger son.
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_TODO_04<tab>Report to Mahiwa.

TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_000<tab>We, the Raen, left the surface long ago that we might forge ourselves a peaceful life under the sea. Maintaining such serenity, however, is not always easy─my two sons can attest to that.
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_001<tab>From the crack of dawn until dusk they fight. Lately, things have started to escalate and they have begun to trouble the entire village with their spats.

TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_002<tab>I have scolded them on multiple occasions, telling them that such disturbing behavior is unacceptable. They, however, still refuse to listen. Perhaps you can try having a word with them?

TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_004<tab>You can start with my eldest son. He should be over by the racks of dried fish. If he attempts to start a fight with you when you approach him, I suggest you respond with a resounding <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>huh<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. That should stop him.

TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_003<tab>Should he try to start a fight with you, I suggest you look him in the eye and respond with a resounding <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>huh<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_NAUGHTYBROTHER02698_000_010<tab>Huh? What do you want? Stop wasting my time. Hurry up and say what it is you've come to say!

TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>By his cocky attitude you sense Mahiwa's eldest son is trying to pick a fight with you. You best <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>huh<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> at him before things get any further out of hand.
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_NAUGHTYBROTHER02698_000_012<tab>I will tell you one last time. If there is something you have come to say to me, say it! If not, begone from my sight!

TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_SYSTEM_000_013<tab>By his cocky attitude you sense Mahiwa's eldest son is trying to pick a fight with you. You best <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>huh<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> at him before things get any further out of hand.

TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_NAUGHTYBROTHER02698_000_020<tab>Huh? <var 1A 02 /var>Huh<var 1A 01 /var>!? Wh-Who do you think you are to take such a lofty tone with me!? Well, if it is a fight you want, it is a fight you will get!

TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_NAUGHTYBROTHER02698_000_021<tab>But wait... Perhaps this is what Mother meant when she said I had an unpleasant attitude. Now that I think on it, I have often done to my brother what you just did to me. Maybe it's what caused our constant brawls.

TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_NAUGHTYBROTHER02698_000_022<tab>I understand now. Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>...and my apologies for trying to fight you. If you happen to see my brother, please tell him I am sorry.
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MYSTERIOUSBROTHER02698_000_030<tab>You came to tell me my brother says he is sorry? I do not believe you.

TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>Mahiwa's younger son appears to be in a sour mood and seems to be looking to take it out on someone. You best <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>huh<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> at him before things get any further out of hand.
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MYSTERIOUSBROTHER02698_000_033<tab>Please, leave me. I just want to be alone!

TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_SYSTEM_000_034<tab>Mahiwa's younger son appears to be in a sour mood and seems to be looking to take it out on someone. You best <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>huh<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> at him before things get any further out of hand.
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_060<tab>So my eldest son has finally come around? That is wonderful to hear! I only hope you see the same amount of success when you speak with my younger son.
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MYSTERIOUSBROTHER02698_000_040<tab>What do you─ You did that because I seem grumpy!? No, you misunderstand.

TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MYSTERIOUSBROTHER02698_000_041<tab><sigh> Mother also often comments that I seem sullen. I am not─I simply do not have much to say. Perhaps my brother has also been mistaking my silence for anger and that is why he shouts at me.

TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MYSTERIOUSBROTHER02698_000_042<tab>I must go and sort this out with him. Thank you, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>. You have made me realize how important it is to let others know what I am thinking. I shall go find my brother now!
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_050<tab>Perhaps now they will be able to find a way to reconcile their differences. Thank you. Until you came along I was at a loss as to what to do.
TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_051<tab>By nature, we avoid using any harsh words or actions. As such, most of what I have to say is easily brushed aside by my children.

TEXT_STMBDZ302_02698_MAHIWA_000_052<tab>You, however, have gotten through to them where I could not. Now the people of the village need not be disturbed by their angry shouts any longer. Please accept this small gift as a token of my appreciation.
